Mustex, Stallex, and Rhesus tie the ropes. They shout
up that it's o.k. and start telling him which way to
manever (naturally Mustex tells Stallex, and Rhesus to
shut up so he won't have to sort through ALL there
yammering just Mustex's).

--- wingedwarrior41@... wrote:
> OOC: That's what I thought.
> 
> Thunderstorm: Here it goes!
> 
> He transforms and flies over the sub. He gets low
> enough to let the 
> others attach some ropes.
> 
> Thunderstorm: Okay. Tie the wires guys!
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...>
> wrote:
> > OOC: The idea was that the opening was inside the
> > cave. I believe the idea would work either way but
> I
> > wanted to make sure you were 100% clear.
> > 
> > Mustex: Sounds good. Let's do it.
> > 
> > --- wingedwarrior41@h... wrote:
> > > Thunderstorm: Okay, and I have a suggestion.
> I'll
> > > transform to chopper 
> > > mode, so you guys can rig the sub to me and I
> can
> > > maneuver it to the 
> > > stream. What about it?
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart
> <dewboy30816@y...>
> > > wrote:
> > > > Mustex sighs.
> > > > 
> > > > Mustex: O.k. look over there.
> > > > 
> > > > He indicates the entrance to the stream.
> > > > 
> > > > Mustex: It's and entrance to an underground
> > > stream.
> > > > Rhesus is pretty sure we can follow it out all
> the
> > > way
> > > > to the ocean. By the way Rhesus how are we
> going
> > > to
> > > > get it under.
> > > > 
> > > > Rhesus: We can probably won't need more than 1
> air
> > > > tank for a sub because the trips won't be as
> long
> > > as
> > > > in space we can use the rest as ballask tanks.
> > > I'll
> > > > rig it up to do so when it's in the water
> > > > 
> > > > Mustex: Great. Now we just need to get it in
> the
> > > > water. Could you help us get it into position?
> > > Facing
> > > > that way.
> > > > 
> > > > He points west.
> > > > 
> > > > 
> > > > --- wingedwarrior41@h... wrote:
> > > > > Thunderstorm: I don't get it, but it doesn't
> > > matter.
> > > > > What can I help 
> > > > > you with?
> > > > > 
> > > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart
> > > <dewboy30816@y...>
> > > > > wrote:
> > > > > > Mustex: Hockey's the best sport in the
> world
> > > > > (cheers
> > > > > > to that) and basketball's its evil
> brother.
> > > Now
> > > > > let's
> > > > > > get back to work.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > He, Rhesus, and Stallex start pulling on
> the
> > > vines
> > > > > > tied to the shuttle again.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > --- wingedwarrior41@h... wrote:
> > > > > > > Thunderstorm: Wha the heck? You know
> this
> > > guy?
> > > > > > > What's basketball and 
> > > > > > > hockey anyways? (He does not know what
> these
> > > are
> > > > > > > because he has never 
> > > > > > > even heard of planet earth)
> > > > > > >

> wrote:
> > > > > > > > Seeing Gorzo Rhesus wildly ran toward
> him
> > > and
> > > > > > > started shaking his 
> > > > > > > > hand.
> > > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > > Rhesus: HI I'M RHESUS! YOU'RE GORZO
> RIGHT!
> > > IF
> > > > > YOU
> > > > > > > ARE I'M SURE BY 
> > > > > > > NOW 
> > > > > > > > EVERYONE ON CYBERTRON KNOWS YOUR FACE!
> I
> > > WAS
> > > > > AT
> > > > > > > THAT GAME AGAINST 
> > > > > > > THE 
> > > > > > > > BALLERS YOU WON 5 STELLAR CYCLES AGO,
> BUT
> > > > > RIGHT
> > > > > > > AFTER THAT I GOT 
> > > > > > > > SHIPED OFF TO THIS SLAG SUCKING
> OUTPOST
> > > THAT
> > > > > > > DOESN'T GET THE SPORTS 
> > > > > > > > PAGE! SO WHAT HAPPENED! HOW BIG ARE
> YOU
> > > NOW!
> > > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > > Mustex: Basketball sucks. Give me
> hockey
> > > any
> > > > > day
> > > > > > > (me too).
> > > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > > Mustex has a quick minor league

> > > > > playing
> > > > > > > for the Argustian

> > > (East
> > > > > Coast
> > > > > > > Hockey League) 
> > > > > > > and 
> > > > > > > > getting injutred, and scared to death
> and
> > > > > > > enlisting in the military.
> > > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > > OOC: I think I had said they were
> there
> > > for 10
> > > > > > > stellar cycles, but 
> > > > > > > if 
> > > > > > > > I'm deniging Stallex is a kid why not
> > > denige
> > > > > other
> > > > > > > stuff. I 
> > > > > > > > probably won't follow up on Mustex
> being a
> > > > > hockey
> > > > > > > player that was 
> > > > > > > just 
> > > > > > > > in there for laughs.
> > > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > > Mustex: Now pass the pizza and help us
> get
> > > > > this
> > > > > > > thing into the 
> > > > > > > water.
> > > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > > He indicates the shuttle and points to
> the
> > > > > small
> > > > > > > opening into the 
> > > > > > > > stream.
> > > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > > Mustex: Mutate's off trying to figure
> out
> > > > > what's
> > > > > > > going on on this 
> > > > > > > > planet.
